tool_description: An API showing all the latest climate change news around the world
name: Climate Change Live_v27
title: Climate Change Live

api_list.name: Home page
api_list.description: This is the API's home page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live408.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live408.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get individual news source news
api_list.description: This API gets news from individual news source

api_list.name: Get all climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
